Title: Once You're Born You Can No Longer Hide
Writer: Marco Tullio Giordana (screenplay), Maria Pace Ottieri (book), Sandro Petraglia (screenplay), Stefano Rulli (screenplay)
Actors: Alessio Boni, Michela Cescon, Rodolfo Corsato, Matteo Gadola
Plot: A coming-of-age drama set in contemporary Italy.
